seedGroups.name: Elaiosomes
seedGroups.description: Elaiosomes are “ant candy” attached to the seeds. Ants are strong and motivated, able to quickly carry the candy back to their home and tossing the heavy “candy wrapper” (seeds) into their compost piles.

species.description: Elaiosomes. This common blue flower pops up in lawns and escapes into woodlands. Flowers are 6 petals, occasionally white. Leaves are grass-like. Do not collect. Plant Hepatica, Mertensia, or Camassia instead.
